theme.spacing: use modern padding/margin with 12-24px gaps between elements
theme.rounded: apply medium to large rounded corners (8px - 20px)
theme.shadows: use soft card shadows for containers

header.layout: Greeting line with user's name and small circular avatar on the right
header.style: light background, bold user name, welcome text underneath

search_bar.style: rounded input with light background and subtle search icon on the right

card.layout: large image, bottom dark overlay with city name and rating

details_page.header: big hero image with back and favorite icon overlay
content: List of upcoming tours with mini cards
details_page.style: clean, white background with subtle dividers

tour_schedule.style: each day expandable with text details and small image
features: bold title for time of day

primary.label: Book a tour
primary.placement: bottom sticky footer on detail pages

guidelines.animation: use light micro-animations for tab switching and button presses

donots: Don't copy the same images or color gradients
Avoid overly dense or flat layouts
Do not use complex shadows or overly dark UIs

target_app.user_goal: Explore, view and book multi-day trips
